name: cmm2i

stmt.origin: breqtri(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c0), cin(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c0))
-| wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c0))
-| wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c0, c1))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
body.pretty:
⊢ c0[C_H](c0 ⋂ c1)
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c0))
-| wceq(cin(c0, c1), cin(c1, c0))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

|- wbr(c0, ccm, cin(c1, c0))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0[C_H](c1 ⋂ c0)
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

comment: A Hilbert lattice element commutes with its meet. (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
